original_title: Chicago Blackhawks: Stanley Cup Champions Special Edition Box Set
overview: Having waited 49 years, the diehard fans of the Chicago Blackhawks would have to agonize a few moments more: Was Patrick Kane's shot really in the net? Had the Stanley Cup finally returned to Chicago?  In this case, great things came to those who waited. Kane's shot 4:06 into overtime had indeed entered the net, giving the Blackhawks their first Cup since 1961 and touching off a celebration that moved from the ice of Philadelphia's Wachovia Center to the jam-packed streets of downtown Chicago to the cities and towns around the globe that Hawks players call home.  This unforgettable moment and many more from five games critical to the Blackhawks championship run have now been collected in one place: the Chicago Blackhawks Stanley Cup Champions Special Edition Box Set
title: Chicago Blackhawks: Stanley Cup Champions Special Edition Box Set
